resources.string: The row of numbers at the top show how many squares the train tracks pass through in the corresponding column. The row of numbers at the top show how many squares the train tracks pass through in the corresponding column.

Your goal is to figure out the path the train tracks make using these numbers. Click on a square in the grid to select it, and then click the tracks you would like to place. You can use the X to remind yourself that a track cannot appear in that square, and the O to remind yourself that a track has to appear in that square.
